verbs.description: [V: is] left 200 mass graves in iraq as many as 12 000 victims including women and children may be buried at the sites office of missing persons anbar town kirkuk mosul iraq salah al - din salahuddin nineveh ján kubiš un mass graves united nations anbar representative
